name: Tata Motors
short_description: Tata Motors Limited designs, develops, manufactures, and sells a range of automotive vehicles.
long_description: Tata Motors Limited designs, develops, manufactures, and sells a range of automotive vehicles. It offers cars, sports utility vehicles, trucks, buses, and defence vehicles, as well as related spare parts and accessories. The company also provides information technology services, machine tools, and factory automation services; and vehicle financing services. It offers its products under the Tata, Daewoo, Fiat, Jaguar, and Land Rover brands. Tata Motors Limited operates in India, the United States, the United Kingdom, rest of Europe, China, and internationally. The company was formerly known as Tata Engineering and Locomotive Company Limited and changed its name to Tata Motors Limited in July 2003. Tata Motors Limited was founded in 1945 and is headquartered in Mumbai, India.
